Accounts

Models

Views

accounts.views.home(request)[source]

Render the home page.

Parameters:

request – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

Rendered HTML template for the home page.

accounts.views.login_view(request)[source]

Handle user login.

If the user is already authenticated, redirect to the home page. If the request is a POST, process the login form.

Parameters:

request – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

Rendered HTML template for the login page.

accounts.views.logout_view(request)[source]

Log out the user and redirect to the home page.

Parameters:

request – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

Redirect to the home page after logging out.

accounts.views.profile(request)[source]

Render the user’s profile page.

Parameters:

request – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

Rendered HTML template for the user’s profile page.

accounts.views.register(request)[source]

Handle user registration.

If the user is already authenticated, redirect to the home page. If the request is a POST, process the registration form.

Parameters:

request – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

Rendered HTML template for the registration page.
